Header: 14 GOC Visits Formations Under Command to His Division
Content: The newly-appointed General Officer Commanding, 14 Division, Major General A.S Ariyasingha during 7-8 January made formal visits to the 142 Brigade, 143 Brigade, 6 Gemunu Watch (GW), 16 Gajaba Regiment (GR), 11 Vijayabahu Infantry Regiment (VIR), 1 Sri Lanka National Guard (SLNG) and 10 SLNG formations as part of his familiarization visits. During those visits, he was briefed by respective Senior Officers and was shown security arrangements at sensitive points, dining and cooking facilities, facilities for Other Ranks, etc. Meanwhile, the GOC called at 141 Brigade and 8 Sri Lanka Light Infantry(SLLI)  and 5 Vijayabhahu Infantry Regiment (VIR) camps on Monday (13) and the 144 Brigade HQ and 2 (V) SLLI camp on Tuesday (14).
